rooms.description: A welcoming entry space featuring a minimalist design with clean lines and ample natural light.
An open-plan living area that integrates Vastu principles by aligning the seating towards the east for positive energy flow. Minimalist furnishing and large windows ensure a bright space.
A functional kitchen designed with modern appliances and storage solutions while incorporating Vastu by placing the sink in the north-east corner for prosperity.
Adjacent to the kitchen ensuring a seamless flow. Minimalist decor with emphasis on natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
A spacious master bedroom oriented in the south-west to ensure calmness and good health. Minimalist design with built-in storage.
A compact guest room designed with simplicity and functionality. Vastu principles suggest positioning the bed in the north-east corner.
Complementing the master bedroom, this bathroom is designed with efficient water usage and privacy. Minimalist fixtures are used.
A small, functional bathroom for guest convenience. Designed in line with Vastu principles by avoiding placement of the water tap at the door.

openings.description: Large enough for vehicles and equipped with security features. Aligned as per Vastu to ensure a positive energy flow.
Large windows that maximize natural light and ventilation. East facing windows are preferred for sunlight in the morning.
Connects the living space with an outdoor patio. Minimalist design with sliding mechanism for ease of movement.
Secured entrance to the private gym located in a quiet section of the ground floor, ensuring privacy and energy balance.

rooms.description: An extra bedroom for extended family or guests. Maintains minimalist design with built-in wardrobes and ample storage.
A quiet space designed for work or study. Vastu principles recommend east-facing windows to encourage focus.
An outdoor living area on the first floor offering views and fresh air, designed following minimalist aesthetics with clean lines.

openings.description: A compact staircase connecting the ground and first floor. Designed with safety features and minimalistic railings.
Ensuring adequate ventilation and natural light throughout the level, adhering to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

rooms.description: A multifunctional room that serves as a lounge and family gathering area. Minimalist design with space for entertainment.
Dedicated to storage of household items and utilities, designed with efficient layout per local building norms.

openings.description: Connects the second floor to the first floor. Minimalist design with secure handrails.
Large windows providing natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles for a balanced living environment.

rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area equipped with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and ample space for exercise routines. Designed with soundproofing in mind.
A flexible space that can serve as a home office or additional workout space. Minimalist design ensuring functionality and ease of movement.

openings.description: Connects the third floor with the second floor. Features minimalistic design and ensures safe transit.
Provides ventilation and natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines for optimal energy distribution.

design_principles.building_norms: Indian Residential and Commercial Design Standards
